content: Hello Jeyachandran, thank you for coming in today. I'd like to start by reviewing your resume and asking a few questions. Can you tell me more about your experience as a Web Developer at Fabromant and Centillion Labs?
yes sir i create projct for fabraman ecomerse website
That's impressive. Can you walk me through your process of creating an ecommerce website using React.js and Node.js? Specifically, how do you handle user authentication and server-side rendering?
